item.title: 05 螢火蟲
item.description: loadSRT('/cs291/srt/Lesson 02\/05 Firefly - Interactive 3D Graphics-oWeox4HjQEM.srt', function(subtitles) { var youtubeExternalSubtitle = new YoutubeExternalSubtitle.Subtitle(document.getElementById('video'), subtitles); }); 螢火蟲圖片 來自 Wikimedia Commons。 我問的單純是眼睛跟光源在同一點會發生什麼事？

item.title: 05A 螢火蟲（解答）
item.description: loadSRT('/cs291/srt/Lesson 02\/05A Firefly - Interactive 3D Graphics-Om2itwxjRbU.srt', function(subtitles) { var youtubeExternalSubtitle = new YoutubeExternalSubtitle.Subtitle(document.getElementById('video'), subtitles); });

item.title: 06 光場維度
item.description: loadSRT('/cs291/srt/Lesson 02\/06 Light Field Dimensions - Interactive 3D Graphics-ucsWmvKKqaM.srt', function(subtitles) { var youtubeExternalSubtitle = new YoutubeExternalSubtitle.Subtitle(document.getElementById('video'), subtitles); }); Another way to say it: how many dimensions are needed if you want to capture the radiance from any location and direction in the universe? One last hint: say you're surrounded by monitors and you want to capture pixels (which store radiance) for all the directions from a point you're standing at.

item.title: 06A 光場維度（解答）

item.title: 07 第一個程式作業
item.description: loadSRT('/cs291/srt/Lesson 02\/07 First Programming Exercise - Interactive 3D Graphics-FCedbqJFOxk.srt', function(subtitles) { var youtubeExternalSubtitle = new YoutubeExternalSubtitle.Subtitle(document.getElementById('video'), subtitles); }); 作業在 這裡 Problems with Programming Quizzes Many of the programming quizzes are no longer functional. All the exercises and demos can all be downloaded from https://github.com/udacity/cs291/archive/master.zip and the repo is here https://github.com/udacity/cs291. They can also be seen in action from this page, just select the exercise or demo from

item.title: 07A 第一個程式作業（解答）
item.description: The following code fixes are needed: Line 30: 1 scene.add( cube ; to 1 scene.add( cube ); Line 65: 1 / draw the coordinate grid to 1 // draw the coordinate grid Line 67: 1 Coordinates.drawGrid(size:1000,scale:0.01, orientation:"y"}); to 1 Coordinates.drawGrid({size:1000,scale:0.01, orientation:"y"});
